attributes.action: Stand up against fascism and Britain First
attributes.additional_details:
Standing against fascism
Britain First are attacking an entire religion not a community
We want any group who is attacking a religions and further party’s to be stopped and banned from being formed to stand election
Britain is a multi-cultural country and on that basis every one of the major religions to be entitled to their public holidays. Just as Xmas is a national holiday. We do not see why such a fuss is made from such little matters.
Our main today is this party be stopped in a peaceful manner and cause any public outbreak amongst community’s.
Anyone creating such parties should suffer imprisonment. There should be an act similar to the terrorism act.
